programme.title: Provocative
programme.desc: Sivan hopes Venya can regain her memory without any prompting on his part, but Vasundra has other ideas. Nadrah worries that Irfan will misconstrue her concern for his recovery as a chance to rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force relentlessly tracks notorious criminals on the Bureau's Most Wanted list.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Sitting on a Fortune S2
programme.desc: Players can win up-to 100,000 in prize money in this high-stakes, high-tension game show hosted by Gary Lineker. But with no lifelines or chances to walk away they will risk everything on getting the right answer.

programme.title: Lingo S4
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Everything you've ever wanted to know about Europe - from traditions and habits to culture shocks and record breakers.

programme.title: Mark Moriarty – Cook Like A Chef - Series 1
programme.desc: In Cook Like a Chef, award-winning chef Mark Moriarty invites viewers to rethink the way they cook at home. Forget the notion that great food demands endless ingredients or hours in the kitchen. With a handful of core ingredients, a well-stocked pantry, and a few pro tips, Mark shows how anyone can create restaurant-worthy meals in their own kitchen.

programme.title: LEGO Masters USA S3
programme.desc: This returning series brings imagination, design and creativity to life when teams of LEGO enthusiasts go head-to-head, with infinite possibilities and anunlimited supply of LEGO bricks. Teams of two will compete against each other in ambitious brick-building challenges to be crowned the country's most talented amateur LEGO builders.

programme.title: Incredible Tales S7
programme.desc: A routine walk home, in the wee hours of the morning, becomes a life-altering ordeal, when a Bartender finds himself becoming the only witness in a terrifying assault case. He may have decided to turn his back, and distance himself from the incident, but injustices have a peculiar way of haunting those who are guilt-ridden, and he was about to be served a reminder, from the netherworld...

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S4
programme.desc: 'The Good Karma Hospital' follows doctor Ruby Walker who swaps England for India and finds herself at an under-resourced and over-worked cottage hospital run by eccentric Englishwoman Lydia Fonseca (Amanda Redman).

programme.title: Lingo UK S1
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Planet Action S4
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets, and get insight information on how the filmmakers make giant monsters come to life. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

programme.title: Monster Jam S3
programme.desc: Returning season. Professional monster truck drivers compete against each other in races and freestyle competitions around the world to win the top prize.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Weather Gone Viral S8
programme.desc: From whirling tornadoes to torrential rains, to harrowing hurricanes, Weather Gone Viral gives viewers unprecedented access to some of the most insane meteorological moments from around the world. Featuring videos of the most extreme and destructive weather conditions, firsthand accounts, and professional meteorologists sharing tales from the front lines, viewers get to experience the fury of Mother Nature.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S2
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze are two young forest monsters that snuck in one day out of the rain. They are a brother and sister, who liked the place so much they decided to stay. (Monsters sometimes do that and it's not even considered rude - but that's just monsters). Anyway, they're all living together in Bibi's magical house even though sometimes Hiccup and Sneeze don't really understand that being a monster and being a human are two very different things...

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C S2
programme.desc: It's Sports Day on CLUB M.A.G.I.C! Miss P is conducting a friendly race among her Positive Agents! Sham makes Miss P proud when he readily congratulates Didi for winning the race. Miss P says he has great sportsmanship! THE BIG WORD is 'marathon' and the smaller words featured are ran, hot and moth. In ROCKIN' RHYTHM, Didi does a sporty aerobicize that gets everyone moving their bodies.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S4
programme.desc: Shelly has trouble with her 10 musical pipes. The Number Squad needs to determine the operational pipes and those requiring fixing. Can they solve the musical mystery and restore harmony? Number squad helps Captain Red to locate the Golden Fluffwort. The squad faces the challenge of deciphering the numerical clues on a mysterious paper to locate the elusive plant.

programme.title: Cows & Crayons S1
programme.desc: Cows & Crayons S1.

programme.title: Tayo the Little Bus 7
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Tayo the Little Bus 7
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Catch! Teenieping
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) Princess Romi accidentally let go of her magical fairies, called Teeniepings. She and her friends are now on a mission to catch all her Teeniepings!

programme.title: Catch! Teenieping
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) Princess Romi accidentally let go of her magical fairies, called Teeniepings. She and her friends are now on a mission to catch all her Teeniepings!

programme.title: Chimera Keepers: Adventures with Incredible Creatures
programme.desc: Join Thelma and Wendy on an extraordinary summer adventure, discovering the unique and magical Chimera creatures!

programme.title: Chimera Keepers: Adventures with Incredible Creatures
programme.desc: Join Thelma and Wendy on an extraordinary summer adventure, discovering the unique and magical Chimera creatures!

programme.title: Dogmatix and the Indomitables S2
programme.desc: Idefix and his indomitable friends Bantera, Stamina and Gluttonix are back to resist the Romans! There's no doubt they will triumph through their unwavering friendship and combined talents, in 52 new and unprecedented adventures filled with adventure and humor, by Toutatis!

programme.title: Dogmatix and the Indomitables S2
programme.desc: Idefix and his indomitable friends Bantera, Stamina and Gluttonix are back to resist the Romans! There's no doubt they will triumph through their unwavering friendship and combined talents, in 52 new and unprecedented adventures filled with adventure and humor, by Toutatis!

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Mike is showered with attention as the ambassador of the popular Pim & Pop juice drink - the Mega Mangosteen Mix! However, he soon discovers that the school's favorite drink harbours a delicious, dark secret.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Following the Pim & Pop debacle, the Puberteens have become the public enemy. Celeste takes it upon herself to single-handedly rehiblitate the Puberteens' image, and encounters a nemesis of old.

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark S3
programme.desc: After the end of the Transformers' war, the Malto family moves to Witwicky, Pennsylvania, to start a new life but their lives soon get entangled with a group of Terran Transformers.

programme.title: Totally Spies S7
programme.desc: Season 7 takes the Spies on their biggest adventure yet, relocating from Beverly Hills to Singapore, experience a new culture and taking on a fresh crop of bizarre villains!

programme.title: Ultraman Omega
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Malay) There are many universes, they may be similar, but they have their own characteristics, as in the case of Omegaverse. A universe that's similar to the original Ultra universe, but has its own ultras. Omega is a Space Garrison rookie who was sent to Earth on a mission to protect it from monsters that appear mysteriously.

programme.title: P. King Duckling
programme.desc: P. King Duckling is an animated comedy series that follows the adventures of a friendly but slightly hapless duck P. King and his two best friends, Wombat and Chumpkins, as they find hilarious and creative ways to overcome challenges.

programme.title: P. King Duckling
programme.desc: P. King Duckling is an animated comedy series that follows the adventures of a friendly but slightly hapless duck P. King and his two best friends, Wombat and Chumpkins, as they find hilarious and creative ways to overcome challenges.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A young silver dragon teams up with a mountain spirit and an orphaned boy on a journey through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S3
programme.desc: Twelve teams from top hotels, restaurants and small businesses compete to be crowned best patisserie team in Britain. Once again, judges Cherish Finden and Benoit Blin set exceedingly tricky challenges, to test the teams' creativity and precision. From towering, skyline-inspired chocolate constructions, to geometric tarts with moving parts, these incredible creations showcase bakers at the peak of their profession.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Weighs
programme.desc: If current trends continue, a quarter of the world's population will be obese by 2035; it is a global crisis. The six tourists come face-to-face with the horrors of the obesity crisis in different parts of the world and confront the alarming truth of what may await them if they don't tackle their own challenges. At the end of each week, participants are weighed together on a giant scale to see if their hard work trying to lose weight - and the shocking things they have seen - has paid off.

programme.title: Planet Action S4
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets, and get insight information on how the filmmakers make giant monsters come to life. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S24
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft disappeared.

programme.title: Crimewatch 2025
programme.desc: Traffic and Drug Offences: A high-speed chase leads to a joint SPF and CNB operation, exposing a web of drug offences. Watch how the Traffic Police work with the CNB to bring the offenders to justice.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Spy In The Ocean
programme.desc: The spy creatures are taking on their most exciting challenge yet, exploring the ocean, one of the most magical and dynamic environments on Earth. A brand-new cast of camera-toting spy creatures take us places no spy camera has ever gone before - from the colour and beauty of coral reefs to the extremes of rocky coasts.

programme.title: Where The Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

programme.title: 阿麦从军
programme.desc: 阿麦承袭盛国公爵位，因见商易之改变心灰意冷，不愿再留盛都，打算回青州。商易之吃醋阿麦与唐绍义单独见面，十分不甘。陈起有心趁南夏才经内乱，再次南征，与皇叔申亭渊合力做戏，哄骗小皇帝答应出征。陈起率领大军再临靖阳边关，南夏朝中武将力荐阿麦领军应战。为天下苍生今后免遭战乱，为黎民百姓能够安居乐业，阿麦再披战袍奔赴战场。大战前夕，陈起约见阿麦劝她弃战，阿麦反借机伏击陈起，二人打心理战。不料陈起竟以靖阳城内百姓性命为要挟，试图炸城，阿麦不得已弃陈起而直奔回城，留唐绍义断后。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 V
programme.desc: 《詹姆士出走料理》以寻找詹姆士私厨菜单为节目主轴，为了寻找记忆中的美味料理，詹姆士将带领大家探索市场，品尝在地美味、寻访料理达人。并在节目中展现特殊食材的处理方式、尝试新的酱料或是新的料理作法，制作创意料理(料理教学)，最后在节目片尾时作出一道『詹姆士创意料理.

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇
programme.desc: 梁欣为杰奇解决美白霜的问题，条件是要杰奇和她假结婚，让她能获得拘留权。杰奇为此唉声叹气，王度要当杰奇的替死鬼，和梁欣结婚，杰奇知道后拉了梁欣到婚姻注册局注册，等到王度赶到，已经太迟了！.

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇
programme.desc: 建海把饭格放在菲菲家门口后离开，子俊悄悄出现，将麝香放进饭菜里。菲菲的哥哥吃后食物中毒，医生告知食物里有麝香，若给孕妇吃了恐怕会流产。建海感疑惑，想起那天他放了饭格后曾见过子俊出现，怀疑是他干的。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 西游记之女儿国
programme.desc: 唐僧师徒途经忘川河，因激怒河神而误入西梁女界。闯入其中，众人才发现这个国家只有女性，并且建国以来此地就没来过男性。而且国有祖训，将男人视为天敌。典籍中更有预言，有朝一日，会有东土而来的僧人带着一只猴子、一头猪和一个小蓝人闯入其中，他们到来之日，便是女儿国走向毁灭之时......。.

programme.title: 21点灵
programme.desc: 谷欣陪天隆拜祭妻子，遇到德刚。天隆见德刚买来妻子生前爱吃的食物拜祭，老怀堪慰。德刚又再冲去厕所，谷欣说出德刚患癌的事，天隆忧心忡忡。谷欣见天隆和德刚其实彼此关心，决定设法化解父子俩的误会。.

programme.title: 21点灵
programme.desc: 德刚怀疑Kai见鬼，向谷欣求助。谷欣通过交谈，知道Kai和一名叫Max的小鬼魂在一起。Max想要回家，却不知自己住在哪里。谷欣和德刚联手调查，终于查到Max的住处。Max的父亲应门，他明显能够见到Max，可是却把众人赶走……。.

programme.title: 邻里厨王 2
programme.desc: 主持人李国煌和权怡凤将带领大家一起寻找生活在你我周围，爱煮会煮的“邻里厨王”！四位参赛者必须用“指定食材”烹煮一道美食，看谁能成为“邻里厨王”！.

programme.title: 极件任务
programme.desc: “世界阿尔巴白松露拍卖会”是意大利一年一度的重要盛事；今年，新加坡将首次参与这个跨国竞标活动。这一集，特派员蔡琦慧将飞到白松露产地，将一批极为珍贵、又极为脆弱的真菌，千里迢迢地带回新加坡，送到拍卖会场地。.

programme.title: 3个女人一个宝
programme.desc: 演员：郭舒贤饰林慧娴；郭蕙雯饰崔芷青；郑各评饰傅炜铭；戚玉武饰袁仁贤；许美珍饰Katie Ong/王凯蒂；唐育书饰Jovan。.

programme.title: 3个女人一个宝
programme.desc: 演员：郭舒贤饰林慧娴；郭蕙雯饰崔芷青；郑各评饰傅炜铭；戚玉武饰袁仁贤；许美珍饰Katie Ong/王凯蒂；唐育书饰Jovan。.

programme.title: 阿嬷来做饭
programme.desc: 《阿嬷来做饭》是全新实况趣味的烹饪节目。每集节目将邀请一位阿嬷来做菜、示范拿手料理，并传承她的好厨艺。由主持人钟琴搭配不同的男嘉宾主持人，同步跟着阿嬷一起做菜，过程中观察阿嬷烹调的独特方式与习惯、领受她无价的真传，将阿嬷的家传菜肴发扬光大。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 长辈甜心
programme.desc: 年龄不过是个数字！退休后的于芳（向云饰），秉持着活到老学到老的精神，和一群志同道合的朋友不断挑战新事物。尽管面对年老人生的种种挑战和悲伤，他们仍不放弃，努力创造精彩的乐龄生活。.

programme.title: 长辈甜心
programme.desc: 年龄不过是个数字！退休后的于芳（向云饰），秉持着活到老学到老的精神，和一群志同道合的朋友不断挑战新事物。尽管面对年老人生的种种挑战和悲伤，他们仍不放弃，努力创造精彩的乐龄生活。.

programme.title: Super BOOMi S7
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/英).

programme.title: Super BOOMi S7
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/英).

programme.title: 哆啦A梦
programme.desc: 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 华文“浆”好玩 S4
programme.desc: 究竟是哪位小朋友居然敢顶撞蒋依讲博士， 还告诉她“门儿都没有呢？” 这就是所谓的初生之犊不怕虎吗？.

programme.title: 奇趣特工队 S3
programme.desc: 凯奇是一个充满好奇心和正义感的男孩，他还有一个神秘的身份：奇趣特工队队长。他和他的伙伴们，调皮骄傲又听得懂外星语的宠物 "闪电猫" 、彬彬有礼、温和待人的管家 "艾尔" 、以及意外流落地球的外星访客 "嘟嘟公主"，组成了守护小镇的奇趣特工队。.

programme.title: 星期二特写 ：香料密码
programme.desc: 砂拉越原住民 Awin 是一名胡椒农。在农民世家出生就注定难逃成为胡椒农的宿命。她从小抗拒胡椒，长大后却猛然觉悟，唯有胡椒才能带领她与族人脱离贫困。魏忪濠年轻时因车祸毁容，人生一度暗淡。因为爱，他娶妻生子，也因为胡椒，他创业卖肉骨茶，肉骨茶生意让他走 出困境，重获幸福。.

programme.title: 嫣语赋
programme.desc: 讲述了秋府最不受宠的大小姐秋嫣如何凭借自己的努力和智慧从深闺大院中走出来，在一桩桩迷案中抽丝剥茧，在一次次困难中辗转前行，与冷面腹黑王爷梁翊从一路斗智斗勇到相伴相知，最终二人收获了属于他们的幸福和爱情的故事。.

programme.title: 嫣语赋
programme.desc: 讲述了秋府最不受宠的大小姐秋嫣如何凭借自己的努力和智慧从深闺大院中走出来，在一桩桩迷案中抽丝剥茧，在一次次困难中辗转前行，与冷面腹黑王爷梁翊从一路斗智斗勇到相伴相知，最终二人收获了属于他们的幸福和爱情的故事。.

programme.title: 医点不夸张
programme.desc: 《医点不夸张》每集节目会邀请两位知名的专科医师，两位艺人、网红分享对抗病魔的经验。主持人还会用贴近生活的方式，让观众对健康问题更有感，一起长知识！.

programme.title: 开着餐车趴趴走
programme.desc: 前往槟城前，三人在十八丁体验了制炭和造船。在现代和传统交织的槟城，他们体验空中索道，了解豆蔻种植和水粉制作。最重要的是，三人尝遍各具特色的槟城美食。最后，他们以吃法特别的加东叻沙，作为本次的交流美食。.

programme.title: 浴水重生
programme.desc: 天晴和长峰终于确立恋爱关系，两人打打闹闹又不失甜蜜。严教练宣布天晴、Beatrice、大壮和Ocean将组队参加接力赛，四人的表现却欠缺默契且互相指责。子慧重返职场的首个任务是筹办慈善晚会。有国外舞团临阵缺席，希琳自告奋勇让学生顶上。希琳运用创意让演出完美呈现，众人刮目相看。.

programme.title: 浴水重生
programme.desc: 希琳以慈善晚宴的舞蹈试图说服Sue让她参与来临的公演，无奈还是碰了一鼻子灰。Kay用匿名网友身份鼓励希琳，也提议希琳将跳舞视频放上社交媒体。天晴生日这天，长峰抓住跟踪狂国立，狠狠教训一顿。Summer及时阻止，长峰才知悉这名鬼祟男子竟是天晴的生父，两人甚至有着长达十多年的纠葛。.

programme.title: 狮城六点半
programme.desc: (现场直播) 《狮城6点半》每日为您提供最全面的本地新闻头条与报道。.

programme.title: 天之骄女
programme.desc: 千娜開山貓追靜柔，想讓她流產。聖元和子婷趕到懸崖卻找不到淑君，健司通知他們去醫院看她。.

programme.title: 天之骄女
programme.desc: 惠珠無意中聽到千娜用死胎陷害靜柔，氣得去找她理論。千娜拿磚頭砸惠珠，把她打下山坡，昏迷不醒。.

programme.title: 天之骄女
programme.desc: 嘉良知道天雷要走私毒品，說服他讓自己一起去碼頭接貨。尚豪偷偷告訴山河時間和地點，沒想到被一龍聽見。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: (现场直播) 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 分家解密
programme.desc: 1965年8月9日，李光耀总理在电视戏剧性的落泪画面，成了大家的集体回忆。殊不知，更令人震撼的桥段其实藏在解密档案和私人书信里。新马分家刚尘埃落定，警方竟揭发暗杀李先生的阴谋，外交官则担心马方或“军事占领”新加坡，而英国人为新加坡基地的未来苦恼 — 秘密存放的核武怎么办？高风险的外交斡旋、人性的脆弱，一切尽在节目下集。.

programme.title: 天伦之情
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 尹松一步步折磨着治焕和世娜，而随着他们的谎言逐渐被揭开，尹松突然的造访让两人感到惊恐不安。.

programme.title: 天伦之情
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 尚哲因治焕给公司造成的巨大损失而勃然大怒，决定将他驱逐出去。 同时，尹松在世娜家过了一夜，几乎把世娜逼到了崩溃的边缘。.

programme.title: 现在开始是Showtime
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 本剧讲述肆意操纵鬼神的魔术师车次雄（朴海镇饰）和具有神通能力的热血女巡警高瑟海（秦基周饰）展开罗曼史，还以偶然卷入的事件中隐 藏的线索为基础，与鬼神合作解决事件。.

programme.title: 17号音乐仓库 （第三季）
programme.desc: 每一本书都有属于它的故事，每一本书的读者也都有属于自已的阅读感受。当我们与一本书相遇的时候，脑海中也许会响起一首专属OST。仓库主理人与仓库好友将在书店开启一场“Book OST”主题Live，他们会带来哪些推荐书单及预期适配的“OST”呢？他们将分享哪些趣事，讲述怎样的过往，延伸出哪些关于人生意义的探讨，唱响关于生活怎样的赞歌？作为“空巢书单”的主理人，“惊喜观众”吴昊宸会分享怎样的人生经历，这场开进书店的Live会碰撞出大家怎样奇妙的化学反应？.

programme.title: 收场
programme.desc: 收场.

programme.title: 歌手2024
programme.desc: 《歌手2024》设立全新的揭榜和袭榜赛制，整体上回归《歌手2018》，赛制为三场一轮，每场均有500位现场大众听审与500位在线大众听审投票，每位听审选择3位自己认为本场表现最佳的歌手。.

programme.title: 生活达人S16
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 飞吧！ 玩客
programme.desc: 由人气主持人何美，搭配拥有超强综艺感的「四大男神」-谢佳见、陈谦文、杨奇煜及台日混血男星各务孝太领航，乘着亚洲航空四大航线，深入东南亚三大国家——马来西亚、泰国与菲律宾七大城市，带观众展开一场热情又神秘的冒险旅程，解锁不为人知的秘境与文化魅力！.

programme.title: 网络陷阱
programme.desc: 特洛伊木马表面看似普通的链接或文件，实际上却隐藏着恶意软件，可能使黑客远程控制我们的设备。让我们来关注中国正在发生的相关事件。.

programme.title: 基督山小姐
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 该剧讲述了一个被信任的朋友逼到死亡的女人下定决心报仇，找回被夺走的人生。.

programme.title: 基督山小姐
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 该剧讲述了一个被信任的朋友逼到死亡的女人下定决心报仇，找回被夺走的人生。.

programme.title: 你太过分了
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 命运的转折让一位耀眼的明星歌手和她的模仿者的生活交织在一起，经历了爱、恨与怜悯。.

programme.title: 你太过分了
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 命运的转折让一位耀眼的明星歌手和她的模仿者的生活交织在一起，经历了爱、恨与怜悯。.

programme.title: 亚洲新声
programme.desc: 该节目由新声启航人Jessie J、新声召集人张靓颖、新声见证人张信哲、新声护航员尤长靖四位歌手加盟，携手亚洲新声代歌手共同开启跨越文化界限的音乐盛宴.

programme.title: 玩火之风
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/泰) Phraphai 是一位熟练的心脏外科医生，她嫁给了电气工程师Din。两人有一个三岁的女儿。自从成为医生和母亲后，繁忙的工作及家庭生活，使Phraphai对爱情提不起兴致。在喝醉的状态下，Din滑倒并与Frame睡在一起。然而，对于Frame来说，这并不是一个错误。她想要更多，她想办法让Din与妻子断绝关系，但Phraphai很聪明。她找出了证据并向Din下了最后通牒，结果一场全面的爱情战争就此拉开序幕。.

programme.title: 玩火之风

programme.title: Kanvas Harapan
programme.desc: Imran Wee's life transformed from one of of luxury and drug trafficking to a simple life caring for his mother and helping inmates reintregate into society. His story shows it's never too late to turn your life around and find meaning in helping others. His message "It's your road, and yours alone, others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you", a quote from the grand poet Rumi, is one he advocates, for individuals to make the right choices.
